entries.name: digest_base << string → digest_baseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Update the digest using given string and return self.

entries.name: block_length → Integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Return the block length of the digest in bytes.

entries.name: digest_length → Integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Return the length of the hash value in bytes.

entries.name: reset → digest_baseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Reset the digest to its initial state and return self.

entries.name: update(string) → digest_baseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Update the digest using given string and return self.
